intro: Ilex nanchuanensis, commonly known as the Nanchuan holly, is a species of evergreen shrub or small tree native to China. It belongs to the family Aquifoliaceae and is characterized by its dense, spiny foliage and small, dark green leaves. The plant produces small, red berries that are an important food source for various bird species. It thrives in well-drained soil and partial shade, making it suitable for ornamental gardening. Due to its limited distribution, it is considered a rare and endangered species in its natural habitat.
